message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you now, as the value of the money decreases faster for me.
I'll take a bit more, since the money's value decreases faster for you.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'll take a bit less this time, $55, and you get $45.  It's only going to get worse for me if we wait longer.
The inflation is hitting you harder, I'll take a bit more this time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly at $50 each and call it a day. This is the last offer I'm making before my share is significantly less valuable.
